name: Vicious Ancient Battle
description:
The opposing active character loses 1 Energy.
(Only one  "Arcane Legend" card can be played per match. This card will be in your starting hand.)
descriptionraw: The opposing active character loses 1 $[K310].\n(Only one {SPRITE_PRESET#3007} "Arcane Legend" card can be played per match. This card will be in your starting hand.)
descriptionreplaced: The opposing active character loses 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color>.\n(Only one {SPRITE_PRESET#3007} "Arcane Legend" card can be played per match. This card will be in your starting hand.)
storytext:
The god whom the people of Watatsumi Island once trusted fought a bitter battle against the ruler of Narukami...
Musoujin Gorge, that yawning chasm in Yashiori Island, is the lasting scar of that conflict...
